root.name: Special Forces
root.description: OverviewIn Special Forces the player controls a platoon of eight soldiers completing various kinds of missions in different parts of the world. Each mission involves up to four team members. It aims for a strategic and tactical approach utilizing the specialities of each team member.Special skills of team membersThe eight different team members each have a selection of the following special skills.Automatics expertCamouflage expertElectronics expertExplosives expertRifles specialistRocket specialistSmall arms expertSniping
